title: Prisoner exchange? Israeli captive families demand answers from Netanyahu
description: Israeli relatives increasingly angry over fate of captives, particularly during military's large-scale bombing of Gaza.

title: Analysis: Israel’s ground attacks yield lots of bang, little success
description: The past four days of land incursions, bombs and an information blackout won't necessarily harm a well-prepared Hamas.

title: Teenage Iranian girl Armita Geravand dies weeks after train incident
description: The government says the 16-year-old fell and hit her head after experiencing a drop in blood pressure.

title: ‘I am scared’: Bombing of Gaza sparks fears in southern Israel
description: In city of Ashkelon, in southern Israel, locals speak of the constant sound of aerial attacks on the nearby Gaza Strip.

title: Mass graves, unclaimed bodies: The war robs Gaza of funeral rites
description: Overwhelmed morgues, cemeteries and near-constant bombardment have made funerals and grieving all but impossible.

title: Hamas’s attack on Israel has changed the Middle East
description: The US regional strategy lays in shambles, as its allies face pressure and its foes seek to take advantage.

title: Palestinians in occupied West Bank face closures, harassment and attacks
description: Entrances to Palestinian villages, towns and cities are blocked, severely restricting commercial and civilian movement.

title: Turkey’s Erdogan tells pro-Palestinian rally Israel is ‘an occupier’
description: Addressing hundreds of thousands of supporters, Erdogan accuses the West of being the main culprit in the war on Gaza.

title: Russia says Israeli bombardment of Gaza is against international law
description: Russia's comments come as Hamas tries to locate eight Russian-Israeli citizens among the hostages it took on October 7.

title: Communication blackout, fuel shortages worsen the situation in Gaza
description: Completely disconnected from the outside world, Palestinians in Gaza struggle to access medical care, essential goods.

title: At least 32 killed, dozens injured in Egypt road crash
description: The multi-car pileup in the Beheira region was reportedly caused by an oil leak.

title: Is the US in trouble in the Middle East?
description: As the West gives its full support to Israel, the Global South takes a different approach.

title: ‘So world knows’: Gaza parents mark children’s names on bodies amid bombing
description: Families are writing their children's names on their bodies so they can be identified after Israeli raids.

title: Dozens killed, many missing after coal mine fire in Kazakhstan
description: A fire at a mine owned by steel giant ArcelorMittal has killed at least 28 workers, with more than 20 still missing.

title: Gaza divides the world along faultlines set by Ukraine war
description: Russia is running short of shells but Israel's war in Gaza threatens to cloud US diplomacy.

title: Israel ‘expanding’ troops in Gaza, Hamas to counter with ‘full force’
description: Israel says it's 'expanding' ground activities in Gaza Strip after telecommunications were knocked out.

title: A cricket rivalry evolves: How Indian fans came to love English players
description: While the cricketing rivalry has often been bitter and influenced by colonial history, it has changed in recent years.

title: UN’s Navi Pillay: Israel has ‘no intention of ending occupation’
description: The chair of the UN Commission of Inquiry discusses findings on 'unlawful occupation of Palestinian Territory'.

title: Thousands of Gaza workers go ‘missing’ in Israel amid wartime mass arrests
description: Israel has so far refused to release information about Gaza workers who have disappeared, human rights groups say.

title: Israel-Hamas war: List of key events, day 22
description: As the conflict between Israel and Gaza enters its 22nd day, these are the main developments.

title: Hong Kong denies visa to prominent Tiananmen Square scholar
description: Rowena He lost her job at the Chinese University of Hong Kong after her visa was not renewed.

title: Gaza under communications blackout, amid warnings of cover for war crimes
description: Enclave without phone, internet services for more than 12 hours amid warnings blackout could conceal rights abuses.

title: Israel’s war on Gaza in 10 explainers
description: The big picture on a rapidly escalating conflict that now threatens to blow up into a regional conflagration.

title: Will the Israel-Hamas war upend China’s Middle East ambitions?
description: The war threatens to thwart Beijing's hopes of emerging as a key mediator and alternative to the US in the region.

title: Gaza’s journalists: Reporting under bombardment
description: With little sleep, internet or safety in the middle of Israel's war, Gazan journalists are getting information out.

title: Dispatches from Ukraine’s front lines: A brigade on the southern front
description: From a subterranean town to the start of a pre-dawn assault, an inside look at life on four front lines over four days.

title: War on Gaza: What’s the impact globally?
description: Bank of Israel cuts growth forecast while the World Bank warns the global economy is at a 'dangerous juncture'.

title: England hold on to beat Argentina in Rugby World Cup third place playoff
description: England finish third at the Rugby World Cup by stopping waves of late Argentina attacks and prevailing 26-23.

title: Israel and Palestine: Is war the only way out?
description: A ground invasion is likely, and an Israeli attempt to expel Palestinians from Gaza is possible. But so is diplomacy.

title: Protesters shut New York’s Grand Central Station, demanding Gaza ceasefire
description: Dozens of protesters seen being arrested by police as authorities announce temporary closure of station.

title: Biden and Xi expected to meet next month after high-level US-China meetings
description: Promises of a meeting between the two leaders follows a trip to Washington by Foreign Minister Wang Yi.

title: ISIL group claims blast that killed four in Afghanistan
description: Sunni Muslim group says on Telegram that it used parcel bomb to target sports club in Kabul.

title: Suspect in mass shooting in Maine that killed 18 found dead
description: At least 18 people were killed after a gunman went on a shooting spree in the northeastern state.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 611
description: As the war enters its 611th day, these are the main developments.

title: FTX’s Bankman-Fried admits ‘mistakes’, denies fraud at trial
description: Sam Bankman-Fried says he never set out to steal from people while testifying in his own defence in Manhattan court.

title: Protests, clashes in Jerusalem and West Bank as Israel-Gaza war rages
description: Pro-Gaza protests break out in neighbouring areas following Israel's bombardment of the Gaza Strip.
